metadata.title: CVE-2022-45869 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A race condition in the x86 KVM subsystem in the Linux kernel through6.1-rc6 allows guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host OS crashor host OS memory corruption) when nested virtualisation and the TDP MMUare enabled.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45869` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-azure - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required
